body:
Hey everyone! Recently I broke my lpatop keyboard, and I'm ordering a new one. I have been playing a lot of the Windows 10 version (It has touchscreen) and its actually not that bad. However, I would like to play it with others.

If you would like to just make a survival world just comment your Xbox name so I can add you.

Thanks!

title: Windows 10 Edition Survival Group
